name: Love n Dream
description:
Features

  • Connect all the pipe to complete puzzle (time and luck will determine how far you can go)
  • Collectible Item - along all the stage, player will have chance to retrieve item from character and understand more about them.
  • 7 kawaii girls from different backgrounds are waiting for you!!
  • Various interaction follow up with the character.
  • Cute voice with different personality from every character.
  • Good luck and happy ending!!
